item.title: Poop still here, 10th September
item.description:

item.title: Fire Safety concern - OG Grill, 10th September
item.description:
We are experiencing persistent cooking odours and fumes inside our flat. This indicates inadequate or poorly maintained extraction/ventilation/insulation, which not only affects our air quality but also raises concerns about fire safety measures in place.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lower Clapton Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Car continuously blocking traffic lane, 10th September
item.description:
This car continues to park on the double yellows or loading bay when not loading causing obstruction to cars and buses impacting 100s of peopleâ€™s journeys A disabled (Blue Badge) holder is not permitted to park in a traffic lane, including one used by buses, if it blocks the free flow of traffic or endangers or inconveniences other road users. This is classified as obstructive or dangerous parking Enfield council please do something as this adds to the traffic and pollution in the area all down to one persons parking

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 109, Station Road, New Southgate, London
Report on FixMyStreet
